original_text: After we had been there a number of days, a prophet named Agabus came down from Judea.
korean_text: 여러 날 머물러 있더니 아가보라 하는 한 선지자가 유대로부터 내려와

sentences.original_text: After we had been there a number of days
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 거기서 여러 날을 지낸 후

sentences.original_text: a prophet named Agabus came down
